name: Zany Golf
overview: Zany Golf, also known as Will Harvey's Zany Golf, is a 1988 video game with a fantasy take on miniature golf, developed by Sandcastle Productions and published by Electronic Arts. The game was originally written for the Apple IIGS, and subsequently ported to the Amiga, Atari ST and MS-DOS machines. In 1990 it was ported the Sega Genesis.
